name: Ghostly Mansion
description:
Ghostly Mansion

Chaotic pumpkins are causing havoc around the mansion and it is up to you to fix it in time. As you go around this spoopy mansion you are met with room after room of heart stopping challenges as the clock slowly ticks to your grave.

With over 20 unique levels the Ghostly Mansion provides a haunting experience in addition to its cute retro art style.

---    ---

Honorable mentions

Kent
A cool person who knows a person.

Game Jam Hosting:
PSU GEMS
This game was apart of a game jam hosted by the Portland Sate Universities GEMS game making club over a 48 hour period. What you see here is the addition  of 2 extra weeks of game production from that game jam.
